info.title: Module Content builder
info.description: Builds a module content with a specified id and class. It loads module's html and can parse module's literals.

prop.name: moduleID
prop.description: The module's id that loads this object.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module's id for this content (if any). Empty by default.

method.name: build
method.description: Build the outer html content container.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The element's id. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The element's class. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $loadHtml
parameter.description: Load html from module's external designer file. False by default.

method.name: loadModuleLiterals
method.description: Loads module's literals in the designer's html file.
